oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quilts; Furniture; Rugs; Exhibit booths
Quilts; Quilting; Fairs; Exhibitions; Occupational therapy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Western State Hospital Occupational Therapy Unit's booth at the West Tennessee District Fair. The booth shows a number of craft items including applique quilts, furniture, wall hangings, lamps, baskets, and brooms.

Western State Mental Hospital was located in Bolivar, Tennessee. Occupational Therapy is the process of using occupation-based activities in therapy sessions for individuals with physical and/or mental disabilties.
